Room.Name: Evenborough Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are enjoying a brisk walk along Evenborough Way.
Room.LongDescription: On the west side of the road, you can see a well-protected jewelry shop called "Doberman's Fine Jewels". The shop looks very well protected, perhaps by some vicious dogs or some other guard animal. On the east side of the road, you can see the Darmanian Memorial, a large park-like facility, preserved by the Darmanian Society through a number of healthy donations.
